short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extracts product data from Walmart, Target, and Amazon search results and provides summaries and CSV downloads.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Search Results Analyzer Chrome extension is designed to streamline product data extraction from Walmart, Target, and Amazon search results. Giving you a quick assessment of what it takes to rank on the first page of results.  The tool enables users to gather essential product information, including the average, maximum, and minimum prices, as well as comprehensive review data such as the average, maximum, and minimum review counts. The extension also supports downloading the extracted data as a CSV file for easy analysis. It allows users to effortlessly collect and analyze product trends across multiple retailers.
